relation: 2 points for adding a new game
1 point for each piece of trivia about a game
1 point for each related game website
1 point for every alternate game title
1 point for each company associated with a game
between one and five points per review, depending on review quality.
1 point for each tech-info/rating system submission
2 points per entry, plus 0.25 points per credit
1 point for every release date and/or patch date.
1 point is awarded for each hint/trick/cheat
